title: Emerald Radiance Diamond Haaram - పచ్చల మెరుపుల వజ్రాల హారం
materials: 22K Gold (916 Gold) with Hyderabadi Polish. Features brilliant-cut Diamonds (VVS Clarity
EF Color) and pear-shaped Emeralds (Zambian origin
features: This stunning haaram showcases a contemporary design with delicate floral and geometric motifs. Each diamond is meticulously pave-set to maximize brilliance. Emeralds are bezel-set, providing both security and enhancing their color. Features a subtle antique finish to accentuate the design details.
colors: Predominantly gold with a dazzling white diamond sparkle and striking emerald green accents.
occasions: or as a statement piece for formal events. Equally suitable for modern saree or lehenga ensembles and contemporary evening wear.
description: A masterful blend of traditional Hyderabadi craftsmanship and contemporary design. The superior quality diamonds and vivid emeralds ensure lasting brilliance and value. The intricate design and fine finish make it a true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations. A perfect symbol of wealth, prosperity, and timeless elegance. The Hyderabadi polish ensures the gold retains its luster for years to come.
